title: urugaadha uLLam
sahitya:
urugaadha uLLam uNdO oppiliappaa
unai ninainthu ninainthu 
       [urugaadha]

anupallavi

piRazhaadha un pEraruLai manadhinilE kaNamum maRavEn
piRavaa varam aruLvaai iniya thiruviNNagaraanE - uni ninainthu 
[urugaadha]

caraNam

Oyaadha thee vinaigaL ozhiththidum thirumaalE
maayaadha bavak kadalil irunthu meeLa aruL sei iyyanE
thEyaadha bhakthiyudan thooyanE un pugazh paNinthEn
thaayaagith thanthaiyaagi dhaaraNiyaik kaaththidum  unai ninainthu  

[urugaadha]
